mean_cn: n. 宣言，声明书；宣布，宣告
mean_en: an official or formal statement, especially about the plans of a government or an organization; the act of making an official statement about something
sentence: The leaders in the room drafted the Declaration of Independence.
sentence_trans: 屋子里的几位领导人拟定了《独立宣言》。
word_etyma: declar宣称 + ation名词后缀 → declaration宣言
